author: alito
text:
SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATES_________________No. 13–1433_________________KEVAN BRUMFIELD, PETITIONERv.BURL
CAIN, WARDENon writ of certiorari to the united states
court of appeals for the fifth circuit[June 18, 2015]Justice Alito, with whom The Chief Justice
joins, dissenting.I join all but Part I–C of Justice Thomas’
dissent. The story recounted in that Part is inspiring and will
serve a very beneficial purpose if widely read, but I do not want
to suggest that it is essential to the legal analysis in this
case.
